explanation: [0-0] A boat with a white hull and a blue top is stationary on the water. The waves churning behind it rise higher than the boat.
[0-2] The wave approaches the white boat and lifts it vertically, causing the bow to point upwards. The bottom of the boat is visible, revealing a green and black color.
[0-2] The wave approaches the white boat and lifts it vertically, causing the bow to point upwards. The bottom of the boat is visible, revealing a green and black color.
[2-5] The rolling wave overturns the white boat, submerging it completely. Black text on a white background appears at the bottom of the screen, reading: "BRING YOUR OWN ANCHOR".

[8-12] The scene changes to a man in an orange life vest and orange shorts riding a jet ski from the water towards the shore. A row of white houses is visible on the distant grassland. As the jet ski hits a sand pile on the shore, it abruptly stops, throwing the man off and onto the beach. Black text on a white background appears at the bottom of the screen, reading: "WEAR YOUR SEATBELT".

[12-15] The scene changes to a man riding a unicycle on a wooden boardwalk. He is wearing a black shirt, yellow shorts, and blue flip-flops. [15-20] The scene changes to two people in the ocean. One is sitting in a large inflatable swan, while the other is lying on a blue surfboard. [20-23] The scene changes to a yellow inflatable raft on the water, occupied by a woman with long hair wearing a blue life vest. The raft is tethered by a rope to a red railing at the bottom of the screen. In the distance, a dense forest is visible. Suddenly, the raft bounces on the water, catapulting the woman into the air. She completes a somersault before landing in the water. Black text on a white background appears at the bottom of the screen, reading: "FLIGHT SCHOOL IS A PLUS".

[23-26] The scene changes to a half-buried orange beach ball on the sand, with the ocean and buildings in the background. A shirtless man in black swim trunks and a black swim cap runs from the left side of the screen and steps on the beach ball with his left foot. His body flips in the air, and he lands face-up on the beach. Black text on a white background appears at the bottom of the screen, reading: "DON'T FLIP OUT". The man then sits up on the beach with his legs crossed.

[26-30] The scene changes to a man in a black wetsuit standing on a white surfboard. In front of him, a shirtless man in black swim trunks is lying in the water. [50-58] The scene changes to a man in a blue shirt, black pants, and a black hat standing on a slanted pillar extending from a terrace into the sea. He loses his balance and slides into the water. Two women wearing swim rings are visible in the water near the man. One ring is black and white, and the other is green with a yellow pattern. As the man plunges into the water, black text on a white background appears at the bottom of the screen, reading: "WATCH YOUR STEP". The women in the swim rings are then shown covering their mouths as they watch the man fall.
